docs.title: Home
docs.text: Welcome to my Database Management Systems (DBMS) notes! This site is organized into 5 units with detailed topics and explanations.

docs.title: 📑 Units
docs.text:
!!! info "Unit 1: Introduction to DBMS" Overview: Learn about DBMS basics, data models, and architecture. ➡ Go to Unit 1

!!! info "Unit 2: Relational Model" Overview: Understand relations, keys, constraints, and ER diagrams. ➡ Go to Unit 2

!!! info "Unit 3: SQL & Query Processing" Overview: Dive into SQL commands, joins, and query optimization. ➡ Go to Unit 3

!!! info "Unit 4: Transaction Management" Overview: Learn about transactions, ACID properties, and concurrency. ➡ Go to Unit 4

!!! info "Unit 5: Database System Architectures" Overview: Explore DBMS architectures, distributed databases, and storage. ➡ Go to Unit 5

docs.title: What is a DBMS?
docs.text: A Database Management System (DBMS) is software that allows users to store, organize, and retrieve data efficiently.
